name: Shef and Bud Co.
description:
Shef and Buds are trying to make fresh, delicious food on their island. Help them craft, cook and create their way to victory!

Play as Shef, a Master Chef! Shef is here to cook new fresh foods on Bud Isle. Through crafting Shef can grow and cook the 4 different foods found on the Isle. Potatoes, Berries, Mushrooms and Wheat!

 

The Lil Buds are here to help! They love to work and sleep but most importantly they LOVE to eat! Feed them different foods to encourage them to complete different tasks for you.

Utilise the different the resources to create better tools and ask the Lil Buds to help you out when you need them!
